thm mdsymlem1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)))), wss(cv(s0), c2))
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wceq(c1, co(c2, chj, cv(s0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)))), wss(cv(s0), c2)), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)))), wss(cv(s0), c2)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  sseqtrd(cv(s0), c2, cin(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)))))
  ad2ant2rl(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)), wss(cv(s0), cin(c1, co(c0, chj, c2))))
  sylib(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0))), wss(cv(s0), cin(c1, co(c0, chj, c2))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c2))))
  anim12i(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)), wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c2)))
  syl6sseqr(cv(s0), c1, co(c2, chj, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cch))
  mpan2(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, cv(s0))), wcel(c2, cch))
  chub2(cv(s0), c2)
  biimpi(wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)), wss(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c2)))
  sseq2i(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0), co(c0, chj, c2))
  chjcomi(c2, c0)
  ssin(cv(s0), c1, co(c0, chj, c2))
  adantrr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)), wceq(cin(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), c2))
  eqtr3d(cin(c1, co(c0, chj, c2)), c2, co(cin(c1, c0), chj, c2), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wbr(c0, cdmd, c2)))
  adantlr(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wceq(co(cin(c1, c0), chj, c2), cin(c1, co(c0, chj, c2))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wbr(c0, cdmd, c2)), wceq(co(cin(c1, c0), chj, c2), cin(c1, co(c0, chj, c2))), wcel(c1, cch), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(c2, c1)))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wcel(c1, cch))
  ancoms(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(c2, c1)))
  anim2i(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wcel(cv(s0), cch), wss(c2, c1))
  syl6sseqr(c2, c1, co(c2, chj, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cch))
  mpan(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wss(c2, co(c2, chj, cv(s0))), wcel(c2, cch))
  chub1(c2, cv(s0))
  mpanl1(wcel(c1, cch), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(c2, c1)), wceq(co(cin(c1, c0), chj, c2), cin(c1, co(c0, chj, c2))), wcel(c2, cch))
  mp3anl1(wcel(c2, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(c2, c1)), wceq(co(cin(c1, c0), chj, c2), cin(c1, co(c0, chj, c2))), wcel(c0, cch))
  dmdi(c0, c2, c1)
  adantr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wceq(co(cin(c1, c0), chj, c2), c2))
  syl5eq(co(cin(c1, c0), chj, c2), c2, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, c2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)))
  oveq1i(cin(c1, c0), chj, c2, cin(c0, c1))
  incom(c1, c0)
  biimpa(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2), wceq(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, c2), c2))
  3syl(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wb(wss(cin(c0, c1), c2), wceq(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, c2), c2)), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch))
  syl5eqel(c1, cch, co(c2, chj, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cch))
  mpan(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wcel(co(c2, chj, cv(s0)), cch), wcel(c2, cch))
  chjcl(c2, cv(s0))
  mpan(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch), wcel(c0, cch))
  chincl(c0, c1)
  mpan2(wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch), wb(wss(cin(c0, c1), c2), wceq(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, c2), c2)), wcel(c2, cch))
  chlejb1(cin(c0, c1), c2)
}

thm mdsymlem1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (((s0 ∈ CH ∧(c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2)∧(c0[MH*]c2 ∧ s0 ⊆(c2[vH]c0)))→ s0 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 =(c2[vH]s0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((((s0 ∈ CH ∧(c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2)∧(c0[MH*]c2 ∧ s0 ⊆(c2[vH]c0)))→ s0 ⊆ c2), d(s0, c0))
  a1ii((((s0 ∈ CH ∧(c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2)∧(c0[MH*]c2 ∧ s0 ⊆(c2[vH]c0)))→ s0 ⊆ c2), d(s0, c2))
  sseqtrd(s0, c2, (c1 ⋂(c0[vH]c2)), ((s0 ∈ CH ∧(c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2)∧(c0[MH*]c2 ∧ s0 ⊆(c2[vH]c0))))
  ad2ant2rl(s0 ∈ CH, (c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2, c0[MH*]c2, s0 ⊆(c2[vH]c0), s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂(c0[vH]c2)))
  sylib((s0 ∈ CH ∧ s0 ⊆(c2[vH]c0)), s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂(c0[vH]c2)), (s0 ⊆ c1 ∧ s0 ⊆(c0[vH]c2)))
  anim12i(s0 ∈ CH, s0 ⊆(c2[vH]c0), s0 ⊆ c1, s0 ⊆(c0[vH]c2))
  syl6sseqr(s0, c1, (c2[vH]s0), s0 ∈ CH)
  mpan2(s0 ∈ CH, s0 ⊆(c2[vH]s0), c2 ∈ CH)
  chub2(s0, c2)
  biimpi(s0 ⊆(c2[vH]c0), s0 ⊆(c0[vH]c2))
  sseq2i(s0, (c2[vH]c0), (c0[vH]c2))
  chjcomi(c2, c0)
  ssin(s0, c1, (c0[vH]c2))
  adantrr((s0 ∈ CH ∧(c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2), c0[MH*]c2, s0 ⊆(c2[vH]c0), (c1 ⋂(c0[vH]c2))= c2)
  eqtr3d((c1 ⋂(c0[vH]c2)), c2, ((c1 ⋂ c0)[vH]c2), ((s0 ∈ CH ∧(c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2)∧ c0[MH*]c2))
  adantlr(s0 ∈ CH, (c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2, c0[MH*]c2, ((c1 ⋂ c0)[vH]c2)=(c1 ⋂(c0[vH]c2)))
  syl2anc((s0 ∈ CH ∧ c0[MH*]c2), ((c1 ⋂ c0)[vH]c2)=(c1 ⋂(c0[vH]c2)), c1 ∈ CH, (c0[MH*]c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1))
  adantr(s0 ∈ CH, c0[MH*]c2, c1 ∈ CH)
  ancoms(s0 ∈ CH, c0[MH*]c2, (c0[MH*]c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1))
  anim2i(c0[MH*]c2, s0 ∈ CH, c2 ⊆ c1)
  syl6sseqr(c2, c1, (c2[vH]s0), s0 ∈ CH)
  mpan(s0 ∈ CH, c2 ⊆(c2[vH]s0), c2 ∈ CH)
  chub1(c2, s0)
  mpanl1(c1 ∈ CH, (c0[MH*]c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), ((c1 ⋂ c0)[vH]c2)=(c1 ⋂(c0[vH]c2)), c2 ∈ CH)
  mp3anl1(c2 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, (c0[MH*]c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), ((c1 ⋂ c0)[vH]c2)=(c1 ⋂(c0[vH]c2)), c0 ∈ CH)
  dmdi(c0, c2, c1)
  adantr((s0 ∈ CH ∧(c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2), c0[MH*]c2, ((c1 ⋂ c0)[vH]c2)= c2)
  syl5eq(((c1 ⋂ c0)[vH]c2), c2, ((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]c2), (s0 ∈ CH ∧(c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2))
  oveq1i((c1 ⋂ c0), chj, c2, (c0 ⋂ c1))
  incom(c1, c0)
  biimpa(s0 ∈ CH, (c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2, ((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]c2)= c2)
  3syl(s0 ∈ CH, ((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2 ↔((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]c2)= c2), c1 ∈ CH, (c0 ⋂ c1)∈ CH)
  syl5eqel(c1, cch, (c2[vH]s0), s0 ∈ CH)
  mpan(s0 ∈ CH, (c2[vH]s0)∈ CH, c2 ∈ CH)
  chjcl(c2, s0)
  mpan(c1 ∈ CH, (c0 ⋂ c1)∈ CH, c0 ∈ CH)
  chincl(c0, c1)
  mpan2((c0 ⋂ c1)∈ CH, ((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2 ↔((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH]c2)= c2), c2 ∈ CH)
  chlejb1((c0 ⋂ c1), c2)
}

thm mdsymlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)))), wi(wne(c0, c0h), wrex(s1, cat, wrex(s2, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s2), chj, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s2), c2), wss(cv(s1), c0)))))))
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wceq(c1, co(c2, chj, cv(s0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)))), wi(wne(c0, c0h), wrex(s1, cat, wrex(s2, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s2), chj, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s2), c2), wss(cv(s1), c0))))))), diffsc(s2, c1))
  syl5(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)))), wne(c0, c0h), wrex(s1, cat, wrex(s2, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s2), chj, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s2), c2), wss(cv(s1), c0))))), wrex(s1, cat, wss(cv(s1), c0)))
  hatomici(s1, c0)
  reximdvai(s1, cat, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)))), wss(cv(s1), c0), wrex(s2, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s2), chj, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s2), c2), wss(cv(s1), c0)))))
  exp32(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cat), wss(cv(s1), c0), wrex(s2, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s2), chj, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s2), c2), wss(cv(s1), c0)))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cat), wss(cv(s1), c0))), wrex(s2, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s2), chj, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s2), c2), wss(cv(s1), c0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cat), wa(wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c2), wss(cv(s1), c0))))
  simplll(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cat), wss(cv(s1), c0)))
  anasss(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cat), wss(cv(s1), c0), wa(wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c2), wss(cv(s1), c0))))
  sylib(wa(wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cat)), wss(cv(s1), c0)), wa(wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c2), wss(cv(s1), c0))), wa(wa(wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), wss(cv(s0), c2)), wss(cv(s1), c0)))
  anim1i(wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cat)), wss(cv(s1), c0), wa(wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), wss(cv(s0), c2)))
  jca(wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cat)), wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), wss(cv(s0), c2))
  adantlr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0))), wcel(cv(s1), cat), wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))))
  adantlr(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2), wcel(cv(s1), cat), wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wcel(cv(s1), cat), wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), cch), wcel(cv(s1), cch))
  atelch(cv(s1))
  chub1(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cat), wss(cv(s0), c2))
  sylanl1(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0))), wss(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), cch))
  atelch(cv(s0))
  mdsymlem1(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  anass(wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), wss(cv(s0), c2), wss(cv(s1), c0))
  rspcev(s2, cv(s0), cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c2), wss(cv(s1), c0))), wa(wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s2), chj, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s2), c2), wss(cv(s1), c0))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s2), chj, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s2), c2), wss(cv(s1), c0)), wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c2), wss(cv(s1), c0)))
  sseq2d(cv(s0), co(cv(s2), chj, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
  oveq1(cv(s2), cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s2), c2), wss(cv(s1), c0), wss(cv(s0), c2))
  sseq1(cv(s2), cv(s0), c2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0))))
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(cv(s0), cat), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cat)
  diff.cat.s(s1)
  diff.wss.s(s1, cin(c0, c1), c2)
  diff.cin.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wbr(c0, cdmd, c2), wss(cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0)))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c0, cdmd, c2)
  diff.cdmd.s(s1)
  diff.wss.s(s1, cv(s0), co(c2, chj, c0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c2, chj, c0)
  diff.chj.s(s1)
  diff.cat.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c2), wss(cv(s1), c0)))
  diff.wss.s(s2, cv(s0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1)))
  diff.co.s(s2, cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))
  diff.chj.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wss(cv(s0), c2), wss(cv(s1), c0))
  diff.wss.s(s2, cv(s0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wss.s(s2, cv(s1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

thm mdsymlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (((s0 ∈ HAtoms ∧(c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2)∧(c0[MH*]c2 ∧ s0 ⊆(c2[vH]c0)))→(c0 ≠ 0H → ∃(s1 ∈ HAtoms, ∃(s2 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆(s2[vH]s1)∧(s2 ⊆ c2 ∧ s1 ⊆ c0))))))
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 =(c2[vH]s0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)

} = {

thm mdsymlem4(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ HAtoms →((c0[MH*]c1 ∧((c1 ≠ 0H ∧ c0 ≠ 0H)∧ s0 ⊆(c1[vH]c0)))→ ∃(s1 ∈ HAtoms, ∃(s2 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆(s1[vH]s2)∧(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s2 ⊆ c0))))))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c2 =(c1[vH]s0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)

  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  syl6ib(s0 ∈ HAtoms, (c0[MH*]c1 ∧((c1 ≠ 0H ∧ c0 ≠ 0H)∧ s0 ⊆(c1[vH]c0))), ∃(s1 ∈ HAtoms, ∃(s2 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆(s1[vH]s2)∧(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s2 ⊆ c0)))), ∃(s2 ∈ HAtoms, ∃(s1 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆(s1[vH]s2)∧(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s2 ⊆ c0)))))
  pm2.61d(s0 ∈ HAtoms, ((c0[MH*]c1 ∧((c1 ≠ 0H ∧ c0 ≠ 0H)∧ s0 ⊆(c1[vH]c0)))→ ∃(s2 ∈ HAtoms, ∃(s1 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆(s1[vH]s2)∧(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s2 ⊆ c0))))), (c0 ⋂ c2)⊆ c1)
  com3l(s0 ∈ HAtoms, (c0 ⋂ c2)⊆ c1, (c0[MH*]c1 ∧((c1 ≠ 0H ∧ c0 ≠ 0H)∧ s0 ⊆(c1[vH]c0))), ∃(s2 ∈ HAtoms, ∃(s1 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆(s1[vH]s2)∧(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s2 ⊆ c0)))))
  imp44(c0[MH*]c1, c1 ≠ 0H, c0 ≠ 0H, s0 ⊆(c1[vH]c0), (s0 ∈ HAtoms →((c0 ⋂ c2)⊆ c1 → ∃(s2 ∈ HAtoms, ∃(s1 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆(s1[vH]s2)∧(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s2 ⊆ c0)))))))
  a1d(c0[MH*]c1, c1 ≠ 0H, (c0 ≠ 0H →(s0 ⊆(c1[vH]c0)→(s0 ∈ HAtoms →((c0 ⋂ c2)⊆ c1 → ∃(s2 ∈ HAtoms, ∃(s1 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆(s1[vH]s2)∧(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s2 ⊆ c0)))))))))
  com23(c0[MH*]c1, c0 ≠ 0H, s0 ⊆(c1[vH]c0), (s0 ∈ HAtoms →((c0 ⋂ c2)⊆ c1 → ∃(s2 ∈ HAtoms, ∃(s1 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆(s1[vH]s2)∧(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s2 ⊆ c0)))))))
  ex(c0[MH*]c1, s0 ⊆(c1[vH]c0), (c0 ≠ 0H →(s0 ∈ HAtoms →((c0 ⋂ c2)⊆ c1 → ∃(s2 ∈ HAtoms, ∃(s1 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆(s1[vH]s2)∧(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s2 ⊆ c0))))))))
  com4t((c0[MH*]c1 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1[vH]c0)), c0 ≠ 0H, s0 ∈ HAtoms, (c0 ⋂ c2)⊆ c1, ∃(s2 ∈ HAtoms, ∃(s1 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆(s1[vH]s2)∧(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s2 ⊆ c0)))))
  exp31(s0 ∈ HAtoms, (c0 ⋂ c2)⊆ c1, (c0[MH*]c1 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1[vH]c0)), (c0 ≠ 0H → ∃(s2 ∈ HAtoms, ∃(s1 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆(s1[vH]s2)∧(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s2 ⊆ c0))))))
  mdsymlem2(s0, s2, s1, c0, c2, c1)
  com3l(s0 ∈ HAtoms, ¬(c0 ⋂ c2)⊆ c1, (c0[MH*]c1 ∧((c1 ≠ 0H ∧ c0 ≠ 0H)∧ s0 ⊆(c1[vH]c0))), ∃(s2 ∈ HAtoms, ∃(s1 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆(s1[vH]s2)∧(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s2 ⊆ c0)))))

  exp31(s0 ∈ HAtoms, ¬(c0 ⋂ c2)⊆ c1, (s0 ⊆(c1[vH]c0)∧ c1 ≠ 0H), ∃(s2 ∈ HAtoms, ∃(s1 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆(s1[vH]s2)∧(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s2 ⊆ c0)))))
  anasss((s0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ ¬(c0 ⋂ c2)⊆ c1), s0 ⊆(c1[vH]c0), c1 ≠ 0H, ∃(s2 ∈ HAtoms, ∃(s1 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆(s1[vH]s2)∧(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s2 ⊆ c0)))))

thm mdsymlem5(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cat), wcel(cv(s1), cat)), wi(wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))), wi(wa(wss(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s1), c1))), wi(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s3), cch), wss(c0, cv(s3))), wcel(cv(s2), cat)), wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s2), co(cin(cv(s3), c1), chj, c0)))))))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wceq(c2, co(c0, chj, cv(s2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)

blocks.name: mdsymlem6
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ mdsymi . This is the converse direction of Lemma 4(i) of [Maeda] p. 168, and is based on the proof of Theorem 1(d) to (e) of [Maeda] p. 167. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jul-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm mdsymlem6(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, cat, wi(wss(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1)), wrex(s1, cat, wrex(s2, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), chj, cv(s2))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wss(cv(s2), c1))))))), wbr(c1, cdmd, c0))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wceq(c2, co(c0, chj, cv(s0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)

blocks.name: mdsymlem7
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ mdsymi . Lemma 4(i) of [Maeda] p. 168. Note that Maeda's 1965 definition of dual modular pair has reversed arguments compared to the later (1970) definition given in Remark 29.6 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 130, which is the one that we use. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jul-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm mdsymlem7(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wne(c0, c0h), wne(c1, c0h)), wb(wbr(c1, cdmd, c0), wral(s0, cat, wi(wss(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1)), wrex(s1, cat, wrex(s2, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), chj, cv(s2))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wss(cv(s2), c1)))))))))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wceq(c2, co(c0, chj, cv(s0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)

  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  impbid1(wa(wne(c0, c0h), wne(c1, c0h)), wbr(c1, cdmd, c0), wral(s0, cat, wi(wss(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1)), wrex(s1, cat, wrex(s2, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), chj, cv(s2))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wss(cv(s2), c1))))))))
  ralrimdv(s0, cat, wa(wne(c0, c0h), wne(c1, c0h)), wbr(c1, cdmd, c0), wi(wss(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1)), wrex(s1, cat, wrex(s2, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), chj, cv(s2))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wss(cv(s2), c1)))))))
  com13(wa(wne(c0, c0h), wne(c1, c0h)), wbr(c1, cdmd, c0), wcel(cv(s0), cat), wi(wss(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1)), wrex(s1, cat, wrex(s2, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), chj, cv(s2))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wss(cv(s2), c1)))))))

  mdsymlem4(s0, s1, s2, c1, c0, c2)
  mdsymlem6(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2)

  syl5sseqr(c1, c0, chba, wceq(cfv(cort, c0), c0h))

  fveq2((_|_ ` c1), c0h, cort)
  pjococi(c1)
  jca(c0 ⊆ c1, c0[MH]c1, c1[MH]c0)
  mp3an12(c0 ⊆ c1, c0[MH]c1, c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  ssmd1(c0, c1)
  mp3an12(c0 ⊆ c1, c1[MH]c0, c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  ssmd2(c0, c1)

  syl5sseqr(c1, c0, chba, (_|_ ` c0)= 0H)

  breq2(c0, cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), c1, cmd)
  bibi12d(wceq(c1, cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch))), wbr(cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), cmd, c1), wbr(c1, cmd, cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch))), wbr(cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), cmd, cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch))), wbr(cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch)), cmd, cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch))))
  breq2(c1, cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch)), cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)), cmd)
  breq1(c1, cif(c1, chba, wcel(c1, cch)), cmd, cif(c0, chba, wcel(c0, cch)))

blocks.name: atdmd2

blocks.name: sumdmdii
blocks.content: If the subspace sum of two Hilbert lattice elements is closed, then the elements are a dual modular pair. Remark in [MaedaMaeda] p. 139. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jul-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm sumdmdlem(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ~H ∧ ¬ c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2))→((c2[+H](span ` { c0 }))⋂ c1)=(c2 ⋂ c1))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
} = {
  eqssd(((c2[+H](span ` { c0 }))⋂ c1), (c2 ⋂ c1), (c0 ∈ ~H ∧ ¬ c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2)))
  ssrdv(hs0, ((c2[+H](span ` { c0 }))⋂ c1), (c2 ⋂ c1), (c0 ∈ ~H ∧ ¬ c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2)))
  syl5bi((c0 ∈ ~H ∧ ¬ c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2)), hs0 ∈((c2[+H](span ` { c0 }))⋂ c1), hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ c1), (hs0 ∈(c2[+H](span ` { c0 }))∧ hs0 ∈ c1))
  elin(hs0, (c2[+H](span ` { c0 })), c1)
  imp4b(c0 ∈ ~H, ¬ c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2), hs0 ∈(c2[+H](span ` { c0 })), hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ c1))
  com23(c0 ∈ ~H, ¬ c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2), hs0 ∈(c2[+H](span ` { c0 })), (hs0 ∈ c1 → hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ c1)))
  sylbid(c0 ∈ ~H, hs0 ∈(c2[+H](span ` { c0 })), (¬ c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2)→(hs0 ∈ c1 → hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ c1))), ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, ∃(hs2 ∈(span ` { c0 }), hs0 =(hs1[+h]hs2))))
  sylancr(c0 ∈ ~H, (hs0 ∈(c2[+H](span ` { c0 }))↔ ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, ∃(hs2 ∈(span ` { c0 }), hs0 =(hs1[+h]hs2)))), c2 ∈ SH, (span ` { c0 })∈ SH)

blocks.name: sumdmdi
blocks.content: The subspace sum of two Hilbert lattice elements is closed iff the elements are a dual modular pair. Theorem 2 of [Holland] p. 1519. (Contributed by NM, 14-Dec-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm sumdmdi(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1))

  -| wcel(c1, cch)
} = {
  impbii(wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1))
  sumdmdii(c0, c1)
  syl(wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), wral(hs0, cat, wss(cin(co(cv(hs0), chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), co(cin(co(cv(hs0), chj, c1), c0), chj, c1))))
  sylbi(wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wral(hs0, cat, wss(cin(co(cv(hs0), chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), co(cin(co(cv(hs0), chj, c1), c0), chj, c1))), wral(hs0, cch, wss(cin(co(cv(hs0), chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), co(cin(co(cv(hs0), chj, c1), c0), chj, c1))))
  mp2an(wb(wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wral(hs0, cch, wss(cin(co(cv(hs0), chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), co(cin(co(cv(hs0), chj, c1), c0), chj, c1)))), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  dmdbr4(hs0, c0, c1)
  ralimi2(hs0, cch, cat, wss(cin(co(cv(hs0), chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), co(cin(co(cv(hs0), chj, c1), c0), chj, c1)), wss(cin(co(cv(hs0), chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), co(cin(co(cv(hs0), chj, c1), c0), chj, c1)))
  imim1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wss(cin(co(cv(hs0), chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), co(cin(co(cv(hs0), chj, c1), c0), chj, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cat))

blocks.name: dmdbr6ati
blocks.content: Dual modular pair property in terms of atoms. The modular law takes the form of the shearing identity. (Contributed by NM, 18-Jan-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: cdjreui
blocks.content: A member of the sum of disjoint subspaces has a unique decomposition. Part of Lemma 5 of [Holland] p. 1520. (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)

} = {
  sylibr((c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2)∧(c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H), ∃!(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ c2, c0 =(s0[+h]s1))), (∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ c2, c0 =(s0[+h]s1)))∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1,((∃(s1 ∈ c2, c0 =(s0[+h]s1))∧ ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, c0 =(hs0[+h]hs1)))→ s0 = hs0)))))

  biimpi(c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ c2, c0 =(s0[+h]s1))))

blocks.name: cdj1i
blocks.content: Two ways to express " ` A ` and ` B ` are completely disjoint subspaces." (1) => (2) in Lemma 5 of [Holland] p. 1520. (Contributed by NM, 21-May-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: cdj3lem1
blocks.content: A property of " ` A ` and ` B ` are completely disjoint subspaces." Part of Lemma 5 of [Holland] p. 1520. (Contributed by NM, 23-May-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm cdj3lem2a(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2)∧(c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H)→(c3 ` c0)∈ c1)
  ⊣ c1 ∈ SH
  ⊣ c2 ∈ SH
  ⊣ c3 =(s0 ∈(c1[+H]c2)↦ iota(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈ c2, s0 =(s1[+h]s2))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2)∧(c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H)→(c3 ` c0)∈ c1), d(s0, c0))
  a1ii(((c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2)∧(c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H)→(c3 ` c0)∈ c1), d(s1, c0))
  a1ii(((c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2)∧(c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H)→(c3 ` c0)∈ c1), d(s2, c0))
  impcom(c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2), (c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H, (c3 ` c0)∈ c1)
  syl5bi((c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H, c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2), (c3 ` c0)∈ c1, ∃(hs0 ∈ c1, ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, c0 =(hs0[+h]hs1))))
  shseli(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2)
  rexlimdvv(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, (c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H, c0 =(hs0[+h]hs1), (c3 ` c0)∈ c1)
  com13((c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2), c0 =(hs0[+h]hs1), (c3 ` c0)∈ c1)
  expd(c0 =(hs0[+h]hs1), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2), (c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H, (c3 ` c0)∈ c1)
  syl5ibr(c0 =(hs0[+h]hs1), ((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)∧(c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H), (c3 ` c0)∈ c1, (c3 `(hs0[+h]hs1))∈ c1)
  3expa(hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c2, (c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H, (c3 `(hs0[+h]hs1))∈ c1)
  eqeltrd((c3 `(hs0[+h]hs1)), c1, hs0, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2 ∧(c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H))
  cdj3lem2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, c1, hs1, c2, c3)
  simp1(hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c2, (c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H)
  eleq1d((c3 ` c0), c1, (c3 `(hs0[+h]hs1)), c0 =(hs0[+h]hs1))
  fveq2(c0, (hs0[+h]hs1), c3)

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)

  diff.hs1.c(c1)

  ⊣ c0 ∈ SH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ SH
  ⊣ c2 =(s1 ∈(c0[+H]c1)↦ iota(s4 ∈ c0, ∃(s5 ∈ c1, s1 =(s4[+h]s5))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s5)

blocks.name: cdj3lem3
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ cdj3i . Value of the second-component function ` T ` . (Contributed by NM, 23-May-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cdj3lem3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cin(c1, c3), c0h)), wceq(cfv(c4, co(c0, cva, c2)), c2))
  -| wcel(c1, csh)
  -| wcel(c3, csh)
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, co(c1, cph, c3), crio(s1, c3, wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s2), cva, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  syl2an(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cva, c0), co(c0, cva, c2)), wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c0, chba))

thm cdj3lem3a(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2)∧(c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H)→(c3 ` c0)∈ c2)
  ⊣ c1 ∈ SH
  ⊣ c2 ∈ SH
  ⊣ c3 =(s0 ∈(c1[+H]c2)↦ iota(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c1, s0 =(s2[+h]s1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2)∧(c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H)→(c3 ` c0)∈ c2), d(s0, c0))
  a1ii(((c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2)∧(c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H)→(c3 ` c0)∈ c2), d(s1, c0))
  a1ii(((c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2)∧(c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H)→(c3 ` c0)∈ c2), d(s2, c0))
  impcom(c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2), (c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H, (c3 ` c0)∈ c2)
  syl5bi((c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H, c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2), (c3 ` c0)∈ c2, ∃(hs0 ∈ c1, ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, c0 =(hs0[+h]hs1))))
  shseli(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2)
  rexlimdvv(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, (c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H, c0 =(hs0[+h]hs1), (c3 ` c0)∈ c2)
  com13((c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2), c0 =(hs0[+h]hs1), (c3 ` c0)∈ c2)
  expd(c0 =(hs0[+h]hs1), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2), (c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H, (c3 ` c0)∈ c2)
  syl5ibr(c0 =(hs0[+h]hs1), ((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)∧(c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H), (c3 ` c0)∈ c2, (c3 `(hs0[+h]hs1))∈ c2)
  3expa(hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c2, (c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H, (c3 `(hs0[+h]hs1))∈ c2)
  eqeltrd((c3 `(hs0[+h]hs1)), c2, hs1, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2 ∧(c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H))
  cdj3lem3(s0, s1, s2, hs0, c1, hs1, c2, c3)
  simp2(hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c2, (c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H)
  eleq1d((c3 ` c0), c2, (c3 `(hs0[+h]hs1)), c0 =(hs0[+h]hs1))
  fveq2(c0, (hs0[+h]hs1), c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H)
  diff.hs0.w((c3 ` c0)∈ c2)
  diff.hs1.w((c1 ⋂ c2)= 0H)
  diff.hs1.w((c3 ` c0)∈ c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)

  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)

}

blocks.name: cdj3i
blocks.content: Two ways to express " ` A ` and ` B ` are completely disjoint subspaces." (1) <=> (3) in Lemma 5 of [Holland] p. 1520. (Contributed by NM, 1-Jun-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
